item.title: Audio production
item.description: This is how you can configure Artix Linux for audio production. The steps should work for any Arch-based linux distro. tl;dr Run paru -S jack2 pulseaudio pulseaudio-jack qjackctl ardour guitarix a2jmidid pro-audio lv2-plugins. Run sudo usermod -aG audio $USER. Create the files with the content inside code blocks below. Reboot. Make sure you run the configured pulseaudio and jackd when you want sound. If you have a MIDI device, run a2jmidid -e to add it as an input device.
